aut-module.titulo: Explore and discover your non-functional requirements through a unique gaming experience

input.crear-exitoso: X La cuenta se ha creado correctamente. Ahora simplemente inicia sesión
input.crear-fallido: X La creación de la cuenta no fue exitosa. Por favor, inténtelo nuevamente más tarde
input.usuario-incorrecto: Incorrect username. Please check and try again

validador.general: Your password must have at least one uppercase letter and one special character

perfil.title: Update Personal Information
perfil.contrasena-hint: If you do not wish to update the password, simply leave the field empty
perfil.contrasena-actual-hint: To confirm the modification of your information, please provide your current password

modal.subtitulo: Are you sure you want to edit your user information?

juegos-creado.title: View your created games
juegos-creado.subtitle: In this session, you'll be able to exit the game
juegos-creado.error: Starting from scratch: Create your first game now
juegos-creado.no-datos: At the moment, there are no games created in your account. To start creating a new one, simply press the button below this message. This step will take you to the interface where you can begin the game creation process easily and quickly.

juegos-jugados.title: View the games you have played
juegos-jugados.error: Starting from scratch: Play for the first time
juegos-jugados.no-datos: At the moment, there are no games played on your account. To start playing, simply press the button below this message. This step will take you to the interface where you can start the process easily and quickly.

crear-juego.fecha-hint: This is the date when your game finishes. By default, it is set to 7 days.
crear-juego.tipo-hint: This is the type of game you should choose.

modales.titulo-ayudanos: Help Us Improve Our Requirements Database
modales.subtitulo-ayudanos: Would you like your requirements to be stored in our database so that other teachers can use them in the future? Your contribution will help us create a more complete and useful library for everyone. Your collaboration is very valuable!
modales.subtitulo-agradecimiento: Your requirements have been successfully stored. Now, if you want to create more games, you will find your requirements already loaded in our database. Thank you for your collaboration, we are committed to offering you a better experience.

componente-form.cargar-req-subtitulo: You can load requirements created by you or other teachers

modal-1.subtitle: Are you sure you want to end the game? Once ended, the created game cannot be edited.

modal-2.subtitle: Only one type of requirement was added, and at least two different types of requirements must be saved.

modal-3.subtitle: Only one type of requirement was added, and at least two different types of requirements must be saved.

modal-4.subtitle: Only one type of requirement was added, and at least two different types of requirements must be saved.

modales.subtitle-2: The game has come to an end. Thank you for playing!

404-page.sorry: Apologies for the inconvenience. Don't worry, we're here to help! Simply press the button below to return to the homepage and continue your journey seamlessly
404-page.page-not-found:
Oh no!
You've strayed from the digital path

general-msg.error-get-user: User not found. Please try again later
general-msg.error-put-user: The user was not successfully edited. Please try again later.
general-msg.error-put-user-password: The current password provided is incorrect.
general-msg.error-pasword-repetido: The current password is the same as the new password entered, they must be different
general-msg.error-crear-juego: The game creation was not successful. Please try again later.
general-msg.ok-crear-juego: The game levels were created successfully. The game code is xxx, which will help your students find your game.
general-msg.error-cerrar-juego: The game creation was not successful. Please try again later.
general-msg.error-guardar-juego: You have already played this game before
general-msg.error-guardar-juego-2: Error saving the score. Please try again later
general-msg.estado_jugado: The game has already been played

general-table.error: You must have at least 5 requirements

tipo-juego.juego-1-title: Detect ambiguous and unambiguous non-functional requirements
tipo-juego.juego-2-title: Detect functional requirements from non-functional ones
tipo-juego.juego-3-title: Detect ambiguous and unambiguous functional requirements
